name: YeungNLP/firefly-train-1.1M
description: This dataset is a large-scale, high-quality, and diverse collection of 1.1 million Chinese language model training examples. Created by YeungNLP for the Firefly (流萤) project, it serves as a vital resource for developing dialogue-style language models. The data is carefully curated, containing 23 datasets across various tasks, ensuring a rich and engaging training experience.
citeAs: @article{YeungNLP_firefly_2023,   title={YeungNLP/firefly-train-1.1M: A Large-Scale Chinese Language Model Training Dataset for Dialogue-style Models},   author={YeungNLP},    year={2023},      url={https://huggingface.co/datasets/YeungNLP/firefly-train-1.1M},   note={This dataset, containing 1.1M examples, was collected for the Firefly (流萤) project, a large-scale Chinese dialogue-style language model. The data comprises high-quality and diverse samples for various tasks, consisting of 23 datasets in total. Each data instance comes with a task type, input, and target output.}, }
creator: YeungNLP
